code: var getEndpoint=function getEndpoint(){var endPoint='';if(!process.env.NODE_ENV||process.env.NODE_ENV==='development'){endPoint='http://127.0.0.1:9997';}else{var fullUrl=window.location.href;endPoint=fullUrl.split('/ui')[0];}return endPoint;};var isValidBearerToken=function isValidBearerToken(token){return token!==''&&token!==undefined&&token!==null&&token.length>10;};var toReadableSize=function toReadableSize(size){var res_size=size/Math.pow(1024.0,2);return res_size.toFixed(2)+'MiB';};export{getEndpoint,isValidBearerToken,toReadableSize};
